page.title: 02LOWER HEATH C.E.SCHOOL
page.content: Lower Heath{school}has 8{staff}of which 3 are teachers,3 are dinner ladies, 1 secretary and 1 cleaning lady.There are 3{classes;}the top has 18 children, the middle has 24 and the infant class has 23 and all together the school has 65 children.The subjects are:{Mathematics, English, {Topic (history and geography), {Science, Scripture, Athletics and {Music.}There is also a new section on the school which is about 110 years old, but the main part is{186}years old.The central-heating is a oil burning boiler connected to the radiators about the school.The age at which the pupils start is the term before their{5th}birthday.They leave at the age{11}.The main holidays are the{Christmas, Easter and summer {holidays}and some half-term holidays and bank holidays.
